thread.title: Nadal beats Fognini to reach 1st hard-court final in more than a year at China Open
thread.title_full: Nadal beats Fognini to reach 1st hard-court final in more than a year at China Open

title: Nadal beats Fognini to reach 1st hard-court final in more than a year at China Open
text:
Nadal beats Fognini to reach 1st hard-court final in more than a year at China Open THE ASSOCIATED PRESS   4:53   4:53   
People: 
East Asia (691) 
BEIJING â€” Rafael Nadal reached his first hard-court final in more than a year on Saturday, beating Fabio Fognini 7-5, 6-3 in the China Open semifinals. 
The third-seeded Nadal's previous hard-court final was at the Sony Open in Miami in March 2014. The Spaniard last won a hard-court tournament two months before that in Doha, Qatar. 
Each player dropped serve twice in the opening set before Nadal got another decisive break when Fognini served at 6-5 down. 
The Italian had beaten Nadal three times this year, including in the third round of the U.S. Open.
